content: *an adorable doggy-themed cable and a cozy turtleneck patons yarns * skill level intermediate sizes to fit chest measurement extra-small 10 ins \ 25 5 cm small 13 ins \ 33 cm medium 16 ins \ 40 5 cm large 24 ins \ 61 cm extra-large 30 ins \ 76 cm materials patons® canadiana 100 g / 3 5 oz or patons classic® wool 100 g / 3 5 oz or patons® decor 100 g / 3 5 oz sizes xs s m l xl 1 2 2 3 4 ball s sizes 4 mm u s 6 and 4 5 mm u s 7 knitting needles size 4 mm u s 6 circular knitting needle set of four 4 mm u s 6 double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge cable needle panel pattern a 8 stitches 20 row panel pattern b 17 stitches 20 row written directions are provided in pdf download march 2009 french version march 2009 manteau pour chien avec biscuits et os 1 *free registration is required to access patterns * 1 http //www patonsyarns com/data/pattern/pdf/patons_kwweb1_kn_dogcoat fr_ca pdf available in english and french at http //www yarnspirations com/pattern/knitting/biscuits-bones-dog-coat
